Title: The Weight of Duty
Description:
I am now the caretaker of Mourning Rise.

At last, I feel the weight of this new responsibility on my shoulders. It is a great honor, but one I must prepare myself for.

Please, help me complete one final task, and then I will be ready.

Meet me back at Fallside Outpost.
ObjectivesText: Meet Urtago at Fallside Outpost to help her take on her new role.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Urtago at Fallside Outpost.
CompletionText: One more task, and then I shall truly be the caretaker.
RewardText:
You brought Korgran peace in his final moments, and now you have helped me fill his absence.

Your aid will not be forgotten.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Urtago at Fallside Outpost
